chapters.name: Awakening
chapters.summary: Discover the first whispers of the ledger prophecy and rally a team of gremlins to investigate.

chapters.name: The Fork
chapters.summary: Navigate diverging paths and decide whether to ally with the consensus keepers or the rogue archivists.

chapters.name: Convergence
chapters.summary: Return to the vault to confront the converging futures and prepare for the Stone Custodian.

epilogue.summary: Face the Stone Custodian in a raid-scale confrontation to secure the ledger prophecy.
